mDynamicRenderTargetSizeX.description: If we create a dynamic render target (that is, a new one every time), then this is it's x size

mDynamicRenderTargetSizeY.description: If we create a dynamic render target (that is, a new one every time), then this is it's y size

mDynamicPixelFormat.description: Set the pixel format of a dynamic rendertarget

mSceneCaptureComponent.description: The scene captor component that will generate the result of our render target

mStage.description: An unknown type (likely an Unreal Engine or plugin type).

mDynamicRenderTarget.description: If true, then we create our own render target every time we want to play
